# PKToolPickerInkingItem

**Class**

An item that represents an inking tool in the tool picker.

## Declaration

```swift
class PKToolPickerInkingItem
```

## Overview

An inking item represents a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKInkingTool-swift.struct] — a tool for drawing marks in a canvas view — in a [doc://com.apple.pencilkit/documentation/PencilKit/PKToolPicker].

## Accessing the inking tool

- **inkingTool**: A tool for drawing on a canvas view.

## Initializers

- **init(type:color:width:azimuth:identifier:)**: Create a new inking tool item.
- **init(type:color:width:azimuth:identifier:)**: Create a new inking tool item.
- **init(type:color:width:identifier:)**: Create a new inking tool item.
- **init(type:color:width:identifier:)**: Create a new inking tool item.

## Instance Properties

- **allowsColorSelection**: Present color selection UI to the user. Default value is YES.

## Creating a tool picker

- **init()**: Creates a new tool picker with a default set of tools.
- **init(toolItems:)**: Creates a new tool picker with the tools you specify.
- **PKToolPickerEraserItem**: An item that represents an eraser tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerLassoItem**: An item that represents a lasso tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerRulerItem**: An item that represents a ruler tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerScribbleItem**: An item that represents a Scribble tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerCustomItem**: An item that represents a custom tool in the tool picker.
- **PKToolPickerItem**: The base class for an item in the tool picker.

## Inherits From

- PKToolPickerItem

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
